sentence.Network_en: When perigee and perihelion coincide tidal range is at its greatest.
sentence.Network_cn: 当月球与地球到达它们的近地点和近日点的时间恰好重合时,就会引起最大的潮汐.

sentence.Network_en: The anomalistic year is the time between successive transits of the Earth through the perihelion.
sentence.Network_cn: 近点年是地球连续两次通过近日点之间的时间.

sentence.Network_en: How much does the direction of perihelion change each orbit?
sentence.Network_cn: 近日点方向使每个轨道改变了 多少 ?

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: alteration of modern Latin perihelium (by substitution of the Greek inflection -on), from Greek peri- 'around' + hēlios 'sun'

means.word_mean: 1. periapsis in solar orbit; the point in the orbit of a planet or comet where it is nearest to the sun
